attributes.action: Allow females access to free sanitary products
attributes.additional_details: Women do not choose to have periods it's human nature but if you can get free condoms and free needles to do drugs I think it's only fair Women get free sanitary products
attributes.background: Give free sanitary products to females

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Fund free period pads" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733282
